Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pao#c# n~iwt n~ack/t/c: abba Senou] piar,/mand~rit/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O my master the ascetic father: Abba Shenute the Archimandrite: that He may forgive us our sins.
